body.name: TP-Link Tapo 2K QHD Security Camera, Indoor/Outdoor, 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟰 𝗣𝗖𝗠𝗮𝗴 𝗘𝗱𝗶𝘁𝗼𝗿'𝘀 𝗖𝗵𝗼𝗶𝗰𝗲, Color Night Vision, Free Person/Pet/Vehicle Detection, Invisible IR Mode, SD Storage(Tapo C120)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 14 mins
features: 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟰 𝗣𝗖𝗠𝗮𝗴 𝗘𝗱𝗶𝘁𝗼𝗿𝘀’ 𝗖𝗵𝗼𝗶𝗰𝗲: Rated outstanding for delivering sharp 2K with loaded features all at a value.

𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗮𝗰𝘁, 𝗩𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗹𝗲, & 𝗪𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗼𝗳: The Tapo C120 is a compact camera rated for both indoor and outdoor use, but it's also built to withstand rain, dust, and the elements with its robust IP66 weatherproof rating.

𝗠𝗮𝗴𝗻𝗲𝘁𝗶𝗰 𝗕𝗮𝘀𝗲 𝗙𝗼𝗿 𝗙𝗹𝗲𝘅𝗶𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗠𝗼𝘂𝗻𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴: The magnetic mount of the C120 allows you easily mount the camera to a metal surface for flexible mounting options. Mount on railings, frames, or even the refrigerator with ease.
𝟮𝗞 𝗤𝗛𝗗 𝟰𝗠𝗣 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: A camera is only as good as the picture it produces. View everything with crystal clear 2K discerning fine detail to ensure nothing goes unseen.

𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗿𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁 𝗖𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗿 𝗡𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁 𝗩𝗶𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻: The integrated Starlight sensor provides bright colorful video at night, and if the conditions are extra dark, two spotlights will help illuminate the area for a better view.

𝗜𝗻𝘃𝗶𝘀𝗶𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗜𝗥 𝗠𝗼𝗱𝗲: The IR light assists in providing night vision up to 30ft. However, if the red light is a distraction, you can switch the lights to invisible mode to monitor without the distraction.

𝗙𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗣𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗼𝗻/𝗣𝗲𝘁/𝗩𝗲𝗵𝗶𝗰𝗹𝗲 𝗗𝗲𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: The Tapo C120 offers complimentary person, pet or vehicle detection utilizing its AI processing power. You can set alerts to only detect certain objects to reduce notifications.

𝗙𝘂𝗹𝗹 𝗗𝘂𝗽𝗹𝗲𝘅 𝟮-𝗪𝗮𝘆 𝗔𝘂𝗱𝗶𝗼: Communication with those in the picture are easier than ever. No more walkie talkie back and forth, you can now talk in real time as if on a telephone for deliveries, with kids, with your pets, and more.
𝗟𝗼𝗰𝗮𝗹 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗖𝗹𝗼𝘂𝗱 𝗦𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗴𝗲: Keep all of your recordings on a MicroSD card up to 512GB or via Cloud through a Tapo Care subscription.
body.description: If you are looking for a compact, feature packed, versatile camera solution, the Tapo C120 is the ideal camera for you. With stunning 2K QHD clarity and robust IP66 weatherproofing, the Tapo C120 helps you see what you want, where you want. Night vision is not an issue with the included Starlight sensor that produces color night vision video when dark. Mounting options are a plenty with a magnetic base that enables you to stick the camera on metal surfaces. The camera includes premium features at no additional cost, such as its free person/pet/vehicle detection, powered by AI processing as well as a suite of other features such as full duplex two-way audio, Alexa and Google compatibility and light and sound alarms. Monitor where you want with custom monitoring zones and add additional privacy with privacy zones. To round out the features, an IR toggle enables you to turn the red IR light on and off to avoid distractions or to provide additional security.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 2K During the Day 2 2K At Night in Color

Previous page Free Smart AI Detection With smart AI detection,choose to detect vehicles,pets, people,or all three. Sound & Baby Cry Detection Be notified of sound that is detected as well as the cries of a baby. Next page 1 Free AI Detection 2 Baby Crying Detection

Full Duplex Two-Way Audio Now you can converse with the subject as if you are talking on the phone. No more walkie talkie-esque back and forth with Full Duplex voice. Voice Activated View Check in on your loved ones when used with a supported device. Works with Alexa and Google Assistant. Dual-Spotlights With dual-spotlights the Tapo C120 provides a better viewing experience especially in low light conditions. Light & Custom Sound Triggers The camera can be set to have the spotlights turn on when motion is detected. You can also customize sound to play in the event of a motion trigger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good security camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the TP-Link Tapo C120 security camera and I must say, it exceeded my expectations. The 1440p video quality is crystal clear, even in low light thanks to the Color Night Vision feature. The person, pet, and vehicle detection is spot on, providing an extra layer of security.,I love the flexibility of using both local and cloud storage options. The 2-way audio is clear, allowing me to communicate effectively through the camera.Setting it up was a breeze, and the price point is unbeatable for the features it offers. Highly recommend this camera for anyone looking for a reliable and affordable security solution!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these cameras to have them indoors continuously recording in order to see what my 2 cats do when I am sleeping or not home. Thus, night vision is an important requirement. The night vision on this camera is extremely detailed even in near pitch black.Another positive is allowing local recording to a microSD card. Many cameras have subscriptions or cloud based services, which I didn’t want. The storage limit for the microSD card is 512GB.Lastly, the app is great too. Easy to navigate, easy to set up the cameras, easy to playback the footage and download it.If I had one gripe, I would say I wish the microSD card storage limit was higher, such as 1GB or more. This would allow for months and months of continuous recording at 2K.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Camera and App.
reviews.reviewText: 1. Camera was very easy to set up, no problems whatsoever.2. The TP-Link app is very good. So far TP -Link has not pestered me about purchasing cloud storage. I have all the camera’s loaded with Micro SD Cards.3. I wish TP-Link had a window mount for this round camera. I purchased a square WYZe silicon mount and this camera fits in their mount with a little trimming.4. I’m all in with TP-Link for camera security, I’ll wait and see how well the cameras hold up to Arizona heat!5. I hope they design a wired doorbell camera, they have a battery doorbell but not good reviews. Only wired doorbell is their KASA brand. I purchased it but it is not very good. I would like them to introduce a dual camera wired doorbell like EUFy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely the best camera for the money
reviews.reviewText: I've been using 3 of this model camera for quite some time and absolutely love it. Whether for inside or outside, this works so good. The pet, line crossing, glass breakage, vehicle, etc detection is surprisingly accurate. The picture quality is just as good if not better than cameras 4x the price. I have used many models (don't want to list them all here, but trust me, you'd know the names) and this stands up to any of them; if not surpassing the functionality and picture quality.The only thing I don't like is that there is no computer/browser interface; it's all mobile. Granted, you can cast to a tv or device on a computer to view video, but it's all driving off your mobile device.Other than that, I absolutely love these and am switching all my monitoring to this company.Oh, one last thing, the motion detection is extremely sensitive, if a fly goes by it, you'll get a motion alert. I turned off general motion alerts and only alert based off animals, people, vehicles, and line crossings and it's great ... and my internal camera is set for glass breakage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My best Tapo Cam yet
reviews.reviewText: The ability to move this type of camera around to various spots is a feature I much use. This particular one has a magnetic bottom and a provided steel plate that may be attached to any surface by screws and the camera mounted to it. The camera is powered by a USB A to C Power cord which requires a USB A power wall charger/adapter.In looking for a 4th Tapo camera I noticed this new model with great reviews from Tech Sources. I can not be more pleased with the quality of the picture. The Night Vision is top notch.I place this in a bay window pointing outward so a power plug is reachable and it sits flat on the surface. Some exterior mounting could be of concern, particularly if it is under low eaves, or otherwise within reach. It seems this could be an easy one to walk off with.None the less, ease of connection and top quality picture make this a big winner for me in the security camera category.I also added the Tapo Care that is offered adding 4 cameras to the plan.works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Cheap Camera
reviews.reviewText: This is the best camera for the money. It has high resolution and easily detects motion. I've been using the camera to view outside my window and the quality is good. The only problem with that is I can't use the infrared night vision since it will reflect on the glass and then I cannot see, but the non-night mode quality for night time is very good and its easy enough to know whats going on outside at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! Great security camera for the cost.
reviews.reviewText: Extremely easy to set up and works perfectly. Video quality is great and it is easy to set up the zones for the type of motion you do or don't want to trigger the camera. Very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Make sure you got full bars of service on your phone.
reviews.reviewText: Great camera when you can finally get it connected to your Wi-Fi.Yeah, the set up instructions are really easy but you need to make sure you got ALL bars of service or you're dead in the water once it needs to connect to Wi-Fi. I had to take this to work and use their Wi-Fi (I had all 5 bars of service there) just to get the camera added to my account and then after that it was having pairing issues. A few resets later and finally got everything to work.Gripes aside, once you have this connected, it's pretty user friendly. The picture isn't as clear as the advertisement makes it seem but you can still see most the details on items. Has a impressively wide view range too and the 2-way audio is a great feature. Right now I have this on the fire place mantle to monitor the interior while I'm away but if it's still working this good in a few weeks, I might even get one for the outside.Just don't be in a rush to use this once you get it...

ch bin absolut begeistert von der TP-Link Tapo C110 WLAN IP Kamera! Diese Überwachungskamera hat meine Erwartungen in vielerlei Hinsicht übertroffen.Zuallererst beeindruckte mich die mühelose Einrichtung. Die beigefügte Anleitung ist klar verständlich, und die Schritte sind leicht zu befolgen. Innerhalb weniger Minuten war die Kamera einsatzbereit, und die Verbindung mit meinem WLAN-Netzwerk verlief problemlos.Die Bildqualität ist beeindruckend scharf und klar. Egal, ob es Tag oder Nacht ist, die Tapo C110 liefert gestochen scharfe Bilder und hochauflösende Videos. Die Infrarot-Nachtsichtfunktion ist besonders beeindruckend und sorgt dafür, dass ich auch bei schwachem Licht oder völliger Dunkelheit klare Aufnahmen habe.Die Bewegungserkennungsfunktion ist äußerst präzise. Die Kamera sendet sofort Benachrichtigungen auf mein Smartphone, wenn sie eine Bewegung erkennt. Dies gibt mir ein großes Maß an Sicherheit und ermöglicht es mir, meine Umgebung zu überwachen, auch wenn ich nicht zu Hause bin.Die Tapo-App ist intuitiv und benutzerfreundlich. Von dort aus kann ich live auf die Kamera zugreifen, Aufnahmen ansehen und sogar mit der Zwei-Wege-Audiofunktion kommunizieren. Die Cloud-Speicheroption bietet zusätzlichen Komfort und Sicherheit für meine Aufnahmen.Die kompakte Größe der Kamera ermöglicht es mir, sie nahezu überall in meinem Zuhause zu platzieren, und das moderne, unauffällige Design passt gut zu meiner Einrichtung.Insgesamt bin ich äußerst zufrieden mit der TP-Link Tapo C110 WLAN IP Kamera. Sie bietet hervorragende Funktionen, einfache Handhabung und ein unschlagbares Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis. Ich kann diese Kamera jedem empfehlen, der eine zuverlässige Überwachungslösung sucht.
Excellent product. Easy installation . Using it to monitor new born baby .. Very convenient and have good sensor as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: For the money, its a blast. All good. Only thing: the Tapo C100 has fish-eye correction. The C110 has not. So the view of the C100 might look better, since straight lines could be more rounded with the Tapo C110.
